posts.post_title: Wanted to Buy-T206 Cy Young Portrait
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Dave Hornish
I am looking to add this card to my collection.  If you have anything in the PSA 1 or 2 or SGC 20-30 range that has a reasonably presentable front, please e-mail me with details/scans.  I would pay by money order.

Thanks,

Dave
